epics.title: Push Notification Opt-in and Device Registration
epics.description: Implement user opt-in for push notifications and manage device registration.

stories.title: Implement Push Notification Opt-in UI
stories.description: Create UI to request user permission for push notifications with a value proposition.
acceptance_criteria: Display value proposition before system prompt

agent_context.goal: Increase user engagement by encouraging opt-in for push notifications.
self_check: Is the value proposition clear and compelling?
Does the UI adhere to accessibility standards?

stories.title: Track Push Notification Opt-in Rates
stories.description: Implement tracking for user opt-in rates for push notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Do not re-prompt users who declined

agent_context.goal: Measure the effectiveness of the opt-in process to improve user engagement strategies.
self_check: Is user privacy respected in tracking?

stories.title: Device Registration for Push Notifications
stories.description: Register devices for push notifications and manage device tokens.
acceptance_criteria: Store device token on successful opt-in

agent_context.goal: Ensure reliable delivery of push notifications by managing device registrations.
self_check: Can users manage multiple devices effectively?

epics.title: Notification Types and Preferences
epics.description: Support various types of notifications and allow users to control their notification settings.

stories.title: Implement Immediate and Batched Notification Types
stories.description: Support immediate and batched notifications for various user activities.
acceptance_criteria: Support immediate notifications for direct messages, @mentions, task assignments, and due date reminders
Support batched notifications for activity summaries, weekly digest, and new features announcement

agent_context.goal: Enhance user experience by providing timely and relevant notifications.
self_check: Are notifications delivered in a timely manner?
Do batched notifications provide value to the user?

stories.title: Develop Notification Preferences UI
stories.description: Create UI for users to control their notification settings.
acceptance_criteria: Provide a master toggle for all push notifications
Allow setting quiet hours and weekend quiet mode

agent_context.goal: Empower users to customize their notification experience.
self_check: Are preferences easily accessible and understandable?
Do changes sync correctly across devices?

epics.title: Rich Notifications and Delivery Infrastructure
epics.description: Enhance notifications with rich content and ensure reliable delivery.

stories.title: Enhance Notifications with Rich Content
stories.description: Include rich content and interaction options in notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Show action buttons like Reply, Mark Done, Dismiss
Provide deep links to relevant app screens
Support expandable content for long messages

agent_context.goal: Increase user interaction with notifications by providing rich content.
self_check: Do rich notifications enhance user engagement?
Are action buttons intuitive and functional?

stories.title: Implement Notification Delivery Infrastructure
stories.description: Ensure reliable delivery of notifications with appropriate infrastructure.
acceptance_criteria: Respect device preferences such as DND mode

agent_context.goal: Ensure notifications are delivered reliably and efficiently to users.

epics.title: Notification Analytics and A/B Testing
epics.description: Track notification metrics and test effectiveness through A/B testing.

stories.title: Develop Analytics Dashboard for Notifications
stories.description: Track and display push notification metrics.
acceptance_criteria: Track open rate by notification type

agent_context.goal: Provide insights into notification performance to improve user engagement strategies.
self_check: Are metrics displayed accurately and in real-time?
Is the dashboard user-friendly and informative?

stories.title: Implement A/B Testing for Notifications
stories.description: Test the effectiveness of notifications through A/B testing.

agent_context.goal: Optimize notification strategies by identifying the most effective variants.
self_check: Is the winning variant correctly identified and applied?
